relation: Stop type, either STOP_WORD, STOP_CLASS, STOP_THEME.
textBeforeTable: This view displays all the preference categories registered in the Text data dictionary. It can be queried by any user. G.1 CTX_CLASSES CTX_VERSION CTX_USER_THES_PHRASES CTX_USER_THESAURI CTX_USER_SUB_LEXERS CTX_USER_STOPWORDS CTX_USER_STOPLISTS CTX_USER_SQES CTX_USER_SECTION_GROUPS CTX_USER_SECTIONS CTX_USER_PREFERENCE_VALUES CTX_USER_PREFERENCES CTX_USER_PENDING CTX_USER_INDEX_VALUES CTX_USER_INDEX_SUB_LEXER_VALS CTX_USER_INDEX_SUB_LEXERS CTX_USER_INDEX_SET_INDEXES CTX_USER_INDEX_SETS CTX_USER_INDEX_PARTITIONS CTX_USER_INDEX_OBJECTS CTX_USER_INDEX_ERRORS CTX_USER_INDEXES CTX_TRACE_VALUES CTX_THES_PHRASES CTX_THESAURI CTX_SUB_LEXERS CTX_STOPWORDS CTX_STOPLISTS CTX_SQES CTX_SECTION_GROUPS CTX_SECTIONS CTX_PREFERENCE_VALUES CTX_PREFERENCES CTX_PENDING CTX_PARAMETERS CTX_OBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_LOV CTX_OBJECT_ATTRIBUTES CTX_OBJECTS CTX_INDEX_VALUES CTX_INDEX_SUB_LEXER_VALUES CTX_INDEX_SUB_LEXERS CTX_INDEX_SET_INDEXES
textAfterTable: Type Description IDX_CHARSET_COLUMN VARCHAR2(256) Name of the charset column in base table. IDX_DOCID_COUNT NUMBER Number of documents indexed. IDX_FORMAT_COLUMNS VARCHAR2(256) Name of the format column in base table. IDX_KEY_NAME VARCHAR2(256) Primary key column(s). IDX_ID NUMBER Internal index id. IDX_LANGUAGE_COLUMN VARCHAR2(256) Name of the language column in base table. IDX_NAME VARCHAR2(30) Name of index. IDX_OWNER VARCHAR2(30) Owner of index. IDX_STATUS VARCHAR2(12) Status. IDX_SYNC_TYPE VARCHAR2(20) Type of synching: MANUAL, AUTOMATIC, or ON COMMIT. IDX_TABLE VARCHAR2(30) Table name. IDX_TABLE_OWNER VARCHAR2(30) Owner of table.
